title: I have been issued a two week ban for shit talking
body:
Because you have issued a one-sided report I shall take it upon myself to share the circumstances as chat is not clear indication of the circumstances of the situations. At the start of this year I had honor level 5. Clearly due to this that is no longer the case. I came back after hearing about the Morde rework comming soon, i've loved this guy since I got here in season 4, and didn't want to be stranded without knowing anyone when that time came. Sadly the start of this season has been a rough one as indicated by what you see below.

Game 1
In-Game
*jungle goes blue -> raptors -> top scuttle -> enemy blue and dies after knowing of a 3-man collapse*
Jg: why didnt you follow
Mid: i cant walk into a talon
Mordekawaiiser: Im nasus i farm
Jg: fucking follow him
Mordekawaiiser: love dipshit jg
*I do a big trade with Teemo despite getting ganked repeatedly*
Mordekawaiiser: gank top
*comes from behind tower eats a shot to place at about 40% teemo auto ignite and gets double buffs, then double kill*
Mordekawaiiser: garbage
Mordekawaiiser: pushed up teemo that got 3 ganks you cant even do 1
*thier jg ganks after i tp below tower*
Mordekawaiiser: and first tower
*bot tells me just farm lol*
Mordekawaiiser: "just farm"
Mordekawaiiser: you have done nothing against a pushed up teemo for 15min
Mordekawaiiser: except do a shit gank
Mordekawaiiser: that costed him nothing and a free double
*from this point im full tilt and the entire team is berating me, in addition to getting gangbanged by the enemy team*
Mordekawaiiser: shit team
Mordekawaiiser: have fun losing
*i ping danger and they walk into a bait, they blame me for not grouping*
Mordekawaiiser: no
Mordekawaiiser: you didnt listen
Mordekawaiiser: that easy
Mordekawaiiser: but no
Mordekawaiiser: like i dasi
Mordekawaiiser: LMAO
Mordekawaiiser: like i said
Mordekawaiiser: gank top not feed
Mordekawaiiser: you are r%%%%%ed
Post-Game
Mordekawaiiser: another day another shit jg


Game 2
Pre-Game
*this makes me laugh because the question someone in the lobby asked was do you have any advice to climb*
Mordekawaiiser: dont be shit
*locked in ivern on our low damage team*
In-Game
*I'm fine with getting hit by one gank, hell maybe two, but three consuctive ganks will pis anyone off*
Mordekawaiiser: shit
Mordekawaiiser: lhdfsat
Mordekawaiiser: '2rw
Mordekawaiiser: shit
Mordekawaiiser: jg
Mordekawaiiser: you picked a garbage jg
Mordekawaiiser: it
Mordekawaiiser: is
Mordekawaiiser: no pressure
Mordekawaiiser: he has sat in front of tower the whole game
Mordekawaiiser: alll you needed to do was gank
Mordekawaiiser: which you didnt
Mordekawaiiser: cuase you are playing a shit jg
Mordekawaiiser: no
Mordekawaiiser: im tired of r%%%%%s on my team
Mordekawaiiser: so ff
Mordekawaiiser: move next
*i got grinded by an urgot after a flash e and a lee sin kick got me out of tower*
Jg: why are you fighting him?
Mordekawaiiser: i didnt
Mordekawaiiser: flash e
Mordekawaiiser: you do not get to do that
Mordekawaiiser: cool
* I ping an area with urgot in it*
Mordekawaiiser: 80% certain
*adc dies after ignoring me*
Mordekawaiiser: never left
*i get two towers by splitting hard, they send three to get me, then my team has a facination with my corpse and decided to go see it, the enemy protected my dead body but not without pointing out my unused flash*
Mordekawaiiser: 3 man gank????
Mordekawaiiser: lmao
Mordekawaiiser: how was i going to run from that
Mordekawaiiser: 3 man gank?
Mordekawaiiser: never flashed???
* our adc is chasing a low health lee sin when urgot shows up but our jinx outranges him and he walked iinto chompers but rather then move away from urgots range she decided to stand still and auto minions around him*
Mordekawaiiser: i suck?
Mordekawaiiser: how could you auto minions 3 times
Mordekawaiiser: and not kite
*points out my 78 farm to urgot 134
Mordekawaiiser: math
Mordekawaiiser: 65%
Mordekawaiiser: r%%%%%s
*tells enemy to report me for being toxic and namecalling*
Mordekawaiiser: mean man in gema call me r%%%%%
Mordekawaiiser: r%%%%%s
Post-Game
Mordekawaiiser: what a quality experience
Mordekawaiiser: this game is shit and so are its players

quite fittingly I got the ban after i went out to cool my head and came back to this lovley screen

I have a dream; where people can shittalk in games without some pansy getting triggered. 
I have a dream, where my impact as a toplaner isnt drowned out by a gold lead established from jungler interference, where mages stayed mid lane and didn't come to top lane for an easy klepto poke fest. 
I have a dream; where riot games listens to their playerbase when making balance decisions, and the staff can be just as great as the artists, writers, and musicians of this game.
But most of all; I have a dream that this game isn't solely based off win-rates, but if playing on both sides feels fun and interactive to both sides.

So I say to you; have my ban lifted, or permaban my account.

I think the whole "I should be able to shittalk in games unimpeded" wish is inherently sociopathic, or at least demonstrative of an alarming lack of empathy. I'm not calling you a sociopath by any means, but I think your attitude is woefully off-base here.

Vocalizing hate in video games has a long history, perhaps most famously during the Xbox era where everybody playing against you in Halo had, at one point or another, fucked your mom. But, as technology improves and gaming has become more mainstream, I believe it has been toned back somewhat. Why? Because it's become increasingly clear to an increasing number of people that we're all human beings, and being on another end of a computer monitor should in no way diminish that. 

To simplify, I hear your desire to scream at your teammates as a lack of acknowledgment that they're people. You're saying things that I assume, or at least hope, you'd be unwilling to say in person, or probably even over the phone. The two-way anonymity is the only reason why you're as hateful as you are, and in modern society that's a poor excuse for bad behavior.

These are just my experiences, but the vast majority of players I encounter (like, 85%) are quite lacking in any human qualities. A lot of the time, it just feels like I'm either playing bots, or even worse, people who are only playing the game to make sure no one else has fun, so most of the time, I actually DON'T consider them as people.
It really does help a lot, when you look at it that way. But, of course, if they're not people, there's no reason to talk to them, anyway, really, so for the most part, I don't say much in chat.

That's a pretty big stretch. Being cocky does not equate to a lack of empathy or morality, and trash talk is a part of all sports whether you like it or not. Vocalizing/communicating your emotions to others is definitely not a sign of sociopathic behavior, it's just rude.

While it can sometimes be offensive; it doesn't necessarily constitute de-humanization. I actually interpret the opposite due to the fact that a person is taking pride in the fact that they are better than others, thus the shit-talking. It would be different if someone were raging at an NPC or the game bugging, but in a competitive game like league of legends, it should be fairly obvious that in order to take pride in your own skills you need to be better than "someone" else. A person who rages or shit-talks others is an asshole, but he is definitely not a sociopath.
